name: Permal Capital Management
overview: PCM is a private equity investment management firm that since its inception in the early 1990s has been providing differentiated investment products to investors worldwide. The PCM team is comprised of a group of individuals whose founders are still part of the investment team today. Established originally as a separate team within the Permal Group; PCM operates today as a fully autonomous and independent entity.

milestones.description: raised a fourth fund of funds, worth $76.5 million to date, to invest in private equity and venture capital stakes on the secondary market
milestones.source_description: Permal raises $77M for secondary VC/PE market

funds.name: Fourth fund of funds
funds.source_description: Permal raises $77M for secondary VC/PE market
